engineerstools.config.title: 工程师的工具配置
item.engineerstools.crushing_hammer.help: §6手持式碎矿锤。§r在工作台与 矿物合成粗矿砂提高矿物产出。耐久度低且不能被修复。 几乎没有攻击伤害。
item.engineerstools.redia_tool.help:
§6真钻石（REal DIAmond）覆盖钢制多用工具。§r融合了斧头、镐和铲子的功能。 状态好时非常高效，耐久度低时效率降低。使用钻石修复。
 右击：放置火把。
 潜行右击：将泥土锄成耕地、砂土等等；剪羊毛，藤蔓、叶子等等。
 潜行破坏原木：砍树。
item.engineerstools.iron_grit.help: §6能冶炼成铁锭，但不适于进行高级的材料加工。
item.engineerstools.gold_grit.help: §6能冶炼成金锭，但不适于进行高级的材料加工。
item.engineerstools.ariadne_coal.help:
§6能画出有向箭头，可用于找到离开矿坑的路。§r
 箭头方向取决于单击方块画箭头的位置。
item.engineerstools.stimpack.help:
§6在你有大麻烦时帮你§r
 ……涨几格生命。同时也会给你一点buff来 逃离当前的困境。警告：注射可能会有延迟。
item.engineerstools.diving_capsule.help:
§6Helps when you're about to drown§r
 ... by automatically pushing a few air boubles back. It just has to be somewhere in your inventory or Curios/Bauble slot. Note that the capsule air tank is limited.
item.engineerstools.sleeping_bag.help: §6使用结实的纤维制作§r，因此防风防雨，非常鲁棒。不会像床一样设置出生点。
item.engineerstools.material_box.help:
§6Simple storage box with shoulder belt for transporting construction materials from A to B§r.
Shift-hover the box in your inventory to inspect. The GUI supports quick-move-all with smart placement (shift-ctrl-click). Accidental 'Cactus-Drop' protection: When not empty, it withstands fire or cactus damage for about 10s.
item.engineerstools.musli_bar.help: §6Nutritional quick snack§r, composed in a Muslee Bar Press of everything you can find, with seeds of corse. People have a tendency to eat too much of it and too fast because it's healthy. Oh, and it's actually Müsli, not Muslee - but who cares.
item.engineerstools.musli_bar_press.help: §6DIY on-the-go press for Muslee Melange Power Bars§r. Drop in some seeds and every food you can find (well, maybe no rotting stuff) to create healthy snacks.
